text: David Raymond Choby (January 17, 1947 â€“ June 3, 2017) was an American prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was the 11th Bishop of Nashville, having served as Diocesan Administrator (2004-2006). He was born in Nashville, Tennessee. Choby died at the age of 70 on June 3, 2017 in Nashville, Tennessee after suffering from an infection caused by a fall. ==References== ==Other websites== *Roman Catholic Diocese of Nashville Official Site *David Choby at DioceseofNashville.com Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:People from Nashville, Tennessee Category:American Roman Catholic bishops
title: David Choby
